show_name: Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka? Bloom
other_title: Is the Order a Rabbit? Bloom
ご注文はうさぎですか? BLOOM
opening_theme: "Tenkuu Cafeteria (天空カフェテリア)" by Petit Rabbit's (Ayane Sakura, Inori Minase, Risa Taneda, Satomi Sato, Maaya Uchida)
